page.title: 01OUR BLOCK
page.content: {I.C.I. own the majority of our {block,}but not all of this is used for the quarrying of Limestone.{Tunstead {is the largest Limestone quarry in {Europe.}I.C.I. also own a railway which runs through Tunstead and is only used for carrying Limestone. The river Wye runs through our block, and as it flows through a gorge it is followed part of the way by{Peak Railway}which uses tunnels and cuttings cross the river. There is another small quarry which is owned by "TARMAC". There are{two villages}in the vicinity. Their size has been reduced over the years and now, Cowdale and King Sterndale{are no more, than {hamlets}and have no shops. There are also a number of{Farms}in our block. The Peak District National Park also runs through our block.
